description:
Whether you’re hiking on the trails, exploring the city, or relaxing at the campsite, the Abisko Cool Short Sleeve Shirt will keep you comfortable and cool in the heat.

  • It is made of lyocell, a natural and renewable fibre that is soft, cool and moisture-wicking
  • The shirt has a regular fit that follows the shape of your body but leaves some breathing room
  • It also has two chest pockets with flaps and buttons, and gussets under the arms for maximum freedom of movement
name: Fjallraven Abisko Cool Short Sleeve Shirt - Men's
